recommendations: Sonali Deshpande “Can describe Rameez best in the below few adjectives in order of his impression Assertive Positive Well informed Creative Humble Enthusiastic I do not recall of one problem that I discussed with him and he did not come up with a solution for. We have the best brainstorming casual talks because he is very accepting to criticism and constructive. His skill sets span across the domain verticals and he can fit right in whatever challenge comes his way. Overall he would be an asset to any working opportunity that comes his way”

Bharti Solanki, PhD “Rameez traveled to the US from India to help us with Software Verification for Data Collection and Data Analysis. His extensive knowledge and experience from his previous works helped us understand the complexity of the new software. Rameez was quick to understand problems and issues and was able to convey the message to the India team. He was also able to figure out solutions and troubleshoot problems and resolve them very quickly. Response and turn around times were less than a day. It was a pleasure to work with him professionally and his easy-going personality carried over into a friendship. I heartily recommend him.”

volunteer_experience.info: HBR Ascend Select is an exclusive and an invite-only community of aspiring leaders, handpicked by HBR Ascend. As a member, I get the opportunity to share my views and opinions with the editorial, marketing and product teams of HBR Ascend. I also participate in various research projects led by HBR Ascend.
